item.title: Good Office Slave Manual
item.description: Yegor Bugayenko has a few tips—a short manual, per se—to help us be good office slaves. Don’t Nag. No matter what is happening, you should never criticize your direct manager. The boss is always right. Everything else may be wrong â€” the situation, colleagues, suppliers, computers, the CEO, investors, the market, or the weather, but not the boss you directly report to. The word of this person is the law.

item.title: Chuck Lorre Productions, 373
item.description: At the end of each episode of “The Big Bang Theory” there is always something witty printed, that passes by so fast you can not read it. Today I saw, and remembered, “… the prophet did not answer right away ….” I looked it up, and this came up. The Prophet A young woman stepped forward from the throng and asked, “0’ great prophet, tell us how we might find love that is unconditional, unwavering and unending.
